mapper.select: select rr.review_stars, rr.review_ctt, rr.created_at, u.user_nickname, p.profile_img_url from RoomReview rr left join User u ON rr.user_id = u.user_id left join ProfileImg p ON u.user_id = p.user_id where rr.room_id = #{room_id} and rr.user_id = rr.review_writer order by created_at desc

select u.user_nickname, rev.review_ctt, rev.created_at from RoomReview rev, Room r, User u where rev.room_id = r.room_id and r.user_id = u.user_id and rev.review_writer = #{user_id} order by created_at desc

select rr.review_ctt, rr.created_at, u.user_nickname, p.profile_img_url from RoomReview rr left join User u ON rr.user_id = u.user_id left join ProfileImg p ON u.user_id = p.user_id where rr.room_id = #{room_id} and rr.user_id = rr.review_writer order by created_at desc limit 6
